skill_constraints: RISK-001: Heavy dependency on backend API stability.
resource_bottlenecks: RISK-002: Security implementation relies heavily on one senior developer.
mitigation_strategies: Utilize mock servers; mandatory security code reviews.

resource_bottlenecks: QA capacity may become a bottleneck with faster development.
mitigation_strategies: Assign a dedicated onboarding buddy; developers contribute to testing.

skill_constraints: Single developer is a critical bottleneck for all FE tasks.
resource_bottlenecks: All frontend development relies on a single person.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressively de-scope non-critical features; focus only on the critical path.
